ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well i for one agree with what the last guy who said about just ignoring it. It s just a game and i don t consider it anything major or ilegal she didn t dupe
ygData.messageBody:
Well i for one agree with what the last guy who said about just ignoring it.
It's just a game and i don't consider it anything major or ilegal she didn't
dupe the stuff or dupe some gold so live and let live.

>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
>Date: Mon, 24 May 1999 02:01:41 -0500
>
>From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
>
>
>
>Neil Lambert wrote:
> >
> > From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
> >
> > i know a 30 day suspension is a really bad punishment but twinking is a
>bad
> > offense
>
>What exactly is so bad about it? How ever easy or hard it is on her, has
>no effect on you, so why don't you just mind your own business and stop
>being so uptight. She's done nothing that brakes the rules or bothers
>other players in any way.
>
>The only bother, is pure green jealousy, isn't it? You're just upset
>that she gets an advantage you didn't, right? Well, life is tough like
>that. Whether she gets an advantage or not, is none of your business
>because it doesn't really affect you. And remember, she had to work her
>way to level 22 before that as well, so she is only giving her other
>Char something she rightfully earned.
>
>Just concentrate on your own character and stop being a jerk about it.
>
>--
>Qenelin
